projects.title: Google Gemini Clone
projects.description: Implemented Google Gemini Clone using React and Google Gemini API to deliver   real-time responses based on user prompts.

projects.title: Password Manager
projects.description: Developed a password manager web application using React, enabling users to securely store and manage usernames and passwords for various websites. Implemented local storage functionality for data persistence and enhanced user privacy.

projects.title: Notes Making Web App
